definition: to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
to neglect one's duty/dereliction of duty

to gain from corrupt dealing/to engage in graft/to feather one's nest

to accuse/to impeach/(in imperial China) to level charges against an official
